commit.message:
env.c (parse_schedule): Reject out of range values.

        * env.c (parse_schedule): Reject out of range values.
        (parse_unsigned_long): Reject out of range, negative or zero values.

From-SVN: r118626

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2006-11-09  Uros Bizjak  <ubizjak@gmail.com>
+
+	* env.c (parse_schedule): Reject out of range values.
+	(parse_unsigned_long): Reject out of range, negative or zero values.
+
+
 2006-10-29  Jakub Jelinek  <jakub@redhat.com>
 
 	PR fortran/29629
